Please enter your registered email to login into the system
1. Poster content is of professional quality and indicates a mastery of the project subject master.
2. The presentation is organized, engaging, and includes a thorough description of the design and the implementation of the design.
3. All team members are suitably attired, are polite, demonstrate full knowledge of material, and can answer all relevant questions.
4. The work product (model, prototype, documentation set or computer simulation) is of professional quality in all respects.
5. The team implemented novel approaches and/or solutions in the development of the project.
6. The project has the potentioal to enhance the reputation of the Innovative Computing Project and/or CCI/DSI.
7. The team successfully explained the scope and results of their project in no more than 5 minutes.
